summary: A director hires an alcoholic has-been and strikes up a stormy relationship with the actor's wife, who he believes is the cause of all the man's problems.
cast: Bing Crosby|Grace Kelly|William Holden|Anthony Ross|Gene Reynolds|Jacqueline Fontaine|Eddie Ryder|Robert Kent|John W. Reynolds|Bob Alden|George Chakiris|Les Clark|Hal K. Dawson|Allan Douglas|Don Dunning|Franklyn Farnum|Ed Fury|Neva Gilbert|Chuck Hamilton|Chester Jones|Howard Joslin|Richard Keene|Kenner G. Kemp|Jack Kenny|Harold Miller|Ida Moore|'Snub' Pollard|Jon Provost|Ruth Rickaby|Jack Roberts|Jeffrey Sayre|Frank J. Scannell|Sarah Selby|Charles Tannen|Max Wagner|Katherine Warren|Dan White|Victor Young
title: La angustia de vivir
